item.title: Version 0.10.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.10.0

What’s New

  • Quick Link Pasting: Paste any copied URL directly into folders using ⌘V for lightning-fast link organization without opening dialogs.
  • Manual Link Creation Shortcuts: Create new links instantly with ⌘N in-app or set your own global shortcut for system-wide access to the link creator.
  • Helium Browser Support: Full integration with Helium’s live tabs for seamless browsing workflow.
  • Customizable Hover Behavior: Choose whether hovering over links shows browser buttons or displays the link title and icon to match your preferred workflow.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed nested folders not appearing in the “Move to Folder” menu and manual link creation folder picker.
  • Fixed app taking 20+ seconds to launch or hanging on startup in some devices caused by iCloud sync issues.
  • Fixed: Smart folders changing order
